# Roleplay Rules
These rules apply **only during an active round**. A round ends when the **round summary appears**. Roleplay rules remain in full effect until that moment, including while the arrivals shuttle is in transit or players are returning to cryo.
Prospect Sector is a **cooperative, progression-based** game mode. These rules ensure that players contribute to station development, expeditions, and a healthy RP environment.
Test modes (such as deathmatch, sandbox, mapping tests, or admin-announced experimental modes) may be exempt from Roleplay Rules. Players who ignore these rules are responsible for confirming that an exempt mode is active.
Roleplay rules **do not apply to ghosts/observers** while they remain ghosts. Dead chat is considered an **in-game out-of-character** channel.
See the list of [textlink="role types" link="RoleTypes"] for more information about cooperative role expectations.
